title: griddy
author: griddy
content: Hi,i am wondering, what is the price for getting quality blog posts about technology, movies, software development or others.The blog posts should be written in english.Any ideas how much is the cost for one average-length blog post? By average-length i mean 5-10 minutes of reading.PS: I want to hire people for doing thatPS2: I hope i wrote to the correct forum as i am a newbie here

comments.author: steve5946
comments.body: Entry-level writers often charge 5 cents per word. Above that, you can expect to find advanced writers.It all goes down to your budget. Whether you want to pay per word or salary basis. But I would advise you to work with a writer for a couple of months before you pay by salary.

comments.body: I'm happy to help. If you need a writer. You can message me on Telegram @prowriterteam

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Get some idea through checking those writers on fiverr. You'll have more idea comparing the freelancers there and how much they write for each article or blog that they write. I don't use that platform so I have no idea about their payment scheme or they allow bitcoin as payment.But if you've seen some great writers here, you can negotiate on how much they charge. You'll find a lot of great writers in the forum that can help you out with the right pricing and quality works.
